comments.content:
Oh yeah ! absolutly !

mrff... sorry... some threads about it, no ? arf  
Thanks

Nah, No real problem, actually.  
_( The ’again’ part always seems to ’sound’ harsher than it should. :)_

It’s not about you, Emannuel — it just seems that once in a while we go through phases. We’ve had a DIN phase and a Reykjavik phase and some others a while back, and right now we’re in the middle of a Gotham phase. :^)
